commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Huff* *Huff* How... How was it?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It looked perfect! You sang and danced better than ever before!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Chuckle* I'm relieved to hear you say that. I feel like I barely managed to pull everything together in time.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The quality of your performances has always been good, yet you're really showing what you're made of by going the extra mile. I can tell how pumped you are.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I just don't wanna put in a mediocre effort since I'm gonna be up on stage on behalf of the whole club. Also...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Also?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I want the incoming students to see just how fun being a school idol is!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Believe in yourself, Ayumu! I'm sure they'll see it that way!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Right!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: You two are still here? Do you have any idea what time it is? I thought somebody had forgotten to turn off the lights.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry, it just took a while to get the finishing touches ready for tomorrow.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm the one to blame here. It was me who wanted to stay a little longer after you suggested that we finish up.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: For goodness sake, it's late. While I understand how dedicated to practice Uehara is, the two of you should really be headed home soon.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay, got it.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Are you still working this late, Shioriko?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I was doing some final checks to ensure nothing had been forgotten, as the school tour is tomorrow.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really? Great job covering all the bases then, Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: The same goes for you. All of your help has at least halved the amount of work I originally needed to get done. You have made my job a lot easier.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm glad I could help.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: While I am on the topic, could I ask you to join the student council? Your management skills are phenomenal. I am sure they would be of great use to the student council.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry, but I love the school idol club. I can't see myself doing anything else.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: If that is the case, I wouldn't mind if you shared your duties across the two roles.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I know you see value in my skills, but I'm not actually that competent. I can't juggle two roles at once.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I don't want to do things at half measures, so I want to completely devote myself to the school idol club right now.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Well then, what do you say about providing your assistance every so often?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hmm... I guess that would be okay?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Thank you very much. Your help is much appreciated.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Chuckle* We can't have you stealing our super club president, you know?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I have no intention of doing that. However, as a former temporary member of the club, I am merely seeking some of her assistance.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Could you two please cut it out now? You're making my cheeks burn up!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: My deepest apologies. Well then, I am expecting the two of you to head...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ah! Sorry! Let me go through everything just one last time.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Uh, isn't that what you said before you started dancing again last time?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: This time I really, totally mean it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Um... Is that okay, Shioriko?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I suppose you must do what you must. This is the absolute final time, okay?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Got it! Thanks!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I have high expectations for tomorrow's live show.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You feel the same way too?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: All of her hard work would go to waste otherwise.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I heard you were the one who invited Uehara to be a school idol. Why her, exactly?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I watched everyone in the club during practice and, honestly... I believe she is the one least suited to being a school idol.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: However, I heard she was the first person you invited. Why was that?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu has incredible abilities. We're childhood friends, so I know her potential because I've watched her ever since we were kids.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Are you saying she has hidden talents that I am not yet aware of?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's how I feel, at least.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: If that's what you say, then perhaps you are right.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Huff* *Huff* What were you two chatting about?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We were just saying how tomorrow's guaranteed to be a success.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I see you are done now. I am assuming you two will finally get ready to...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wait! Just one last time!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I believe we came to an agreement about this already, Uehara.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I know but... I wanna finish off by dancing with you, Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: With me?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I was captivated by how beautiful your dance movements are. I feel like I can dance in the same beautiful way when I have lessons with you. So...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Please, Shioriko?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Goodness me. There is no compromising with you two. This is absolutely and truly the final time. Do I make myself clear?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yup! Thanks!
